description: This file contains the function prototypes and macro definitions for the HTTP Mbo Identity Object API, which is part of the HTTP protocol implementation in the BroadWay Service Delivery System. It declares functions for creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing the Mbo Identity object.

methods.name: HttpCreateMboIdentity
methods.description: Factory function to create a new HTTP Mbo Identity object instance.

methods.name: HttpMboIdtCreate
methods.description: Function to instantiate the Mbo Identity object.

methods.name: HttpMboIdtRemove
methods.description: Function to remove and clean up the Mbo Identity object instance.

methods.name: HttpMboIdtEnrollObjects
methods.description: Initializes and enrolls internal objects within the Mbo Identity object.

methods.name: HttpMboIdtInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Mbo Identity object state.
